resources.string: Next - even more interesting, the new job, \n\r insidious opponents. A fascinating journey \n\r waiting for you!

Walk with Frog Skok all 
 obstacles grabbing different things. 
 Collect all the stars and moves to the next 
 level. Beware of malicious wasps and the island 
 needle urchins and cacti. 
 Good luck, my dear friend! =)

We really appreciate your opinion, 
 please leave review and rate the game.
 
 If you have suggestions or comments email 
 us know and we will take into account 
 in the further development.


 Thanks!

We want to thank you for being downloaded 
 our game. We sincerely hope that the game 
 You will enjoy and have a nice time.
